attributes.action: Make it an illegal act to hold racist, insulting or derogatory demonstrations against British Troops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To hold any form of insulting demonstration to our brave & proud members of the Armed Forces of Great Britain should be made illegal. They serve our Country honorably, they also perform their duties in many nations who require help without thought for themselves, as they have made an Oath to serve Queen & Country, so surly we the Great British Public need to defend them as they defend us in times of strife, they are proud members of OUR BRITISH SERVICES.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
